result.title: Patterned illumination
result.description: Hardware and software for patterned illumination setup. DMD (“digital micromirror device”) based illumination system with multiple wavelengths and optimize it for mammalian cells. Automated procedures to align the coordinate systems of the sample and the DMD. Design of control interfaces to enable simple and reliable device operation.
